effect.en: This attack does 10 damage for each card in your hand.
effect.fr: Cette attaque inflige 10 dégâts pour chaque carte dans votre main.
effect.es: Este ataque hace 10 puntos de daño por cada carta en tu mano.
effect.it: Questo attacco infligge 10 danni per ogni carta nella tua mano.
effect.pt: Este ataque causa 10 pontos de dano para cada carta na sua mão.
effect.de: Diese Attacke fügt für jede Karte auf deiner Hand 10 Schadenspunkte zu.

description.en: Through its horns, it can pick up on the emotions of creatures around it. Positive emotions are the source of its strength.
